channel.title: Identity on CantScript
channel.description: Recent content in Identity on CantScript

item.title: macOS Authenticated Enrolment Passthrough in Jamf School
item.description: Creating a user experience with the least amount of friction is key to a great onboarding and theres nothing more grinding than entering credentials over and over. Find out how to passthrough user details from an Authenticated Enrolment to Jamf Connect.
